title: x/mobile: building bind/hello example meets with an error: "hello/Hello.h  file not found"
body:
I am building the [gomobile Hello][1] example app, but am running into the following problem: When trying to build and run the app after opening it in Xcode (7.1), I get the error 'hello/Hello.h' file not found'
From what I can tell, Hello.h is in fact in the hello folder of the native directory.

[error in Xcode and the file it's in][2]


  [1]: https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/Mobile#building-and-deploying-to-ios
  [2]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/CPhQX.png
